languages.text: "Песнь о дороге кровавых следов рассказывает о пути, полном испытаний. Ступив на него, приняв его, ты прош{mf|ел|ла} первое — испытание решительности. Ибо не каждый отринуть готов страх и сомнения, чтобы на поиски неизведанного отправиться. На поиски смерти. Вторым испытанием было испытание сострадания. Ты прош{mf|ел|ла} его, пусть и на время короткое, но посвятив себя служению другой душе — обожженного страдальца. Ибо выбирать между жизнью и смертью могут лишь те, кто готов нести ответственность за чужую боль".

"The Song of Trailing Blood tells of a path fraught with trials. By accepting it and setting out on that path, you passed the first one, the trial of resolve. For not everyone is prepared to shun their fear and doubt and embark on a search for the unknown. A search for death. The trial of compassion was the second one. You passed it when you put yourself, albeit briefly, in the service of another soul, a man suffering from burns. For the choice between life and death is to be made only by those willing to take responsibility for the pain of another."
languages.original_text: "Песнь о дороге кровавых следов рассказывает о пути, полном испытаний. Ступив на него, приняв его, ты прош{mf|ел|ла} первое — испытание решительности. Ибо не каждый отринуть готов страх и сомнения, чтобы на поиски неизведанного отправиться. На поиски смерти. Вторым испытанием было испытание сострадания. Ибо выбирать между жизнью и смертью могут лишь те, кто готов нести ответственность за чужую боль".

For the choice between life and death is to be made only by those willing to take responsibility for the pain of another."

languages.text: "Das Lied von der Blutspur" berichtet von einem Pfad voller Prüfungen. Indem Ihr das akzeptiert und diesen Pfad eingeschlagen habt, habt Ihr die erste Prüfung bestanden, die Prüfung der Entschlossenheit. Denn nicht jeder ist bereit, seine Ängste und Zweifel zu ignorieren und sich auf eine Suche nach dem Unbekannten zu begeben. Auf die Suche nach dem Tod. Die zweite Prüfung war die des Mitgefühls. Ihr habt sie bestanden, als Ihr Euch selbst, wenn auch nur kurz, in den Dienst einer anderen Seele gestellt habt, eines Mannes, der an Verbrennungen leidet. Denn die Wahl zwischen Leben und Tod darf nur von jenen getroffen werden, die bereit sind, die Verantwortung für den Schmerz eines anderen zu übernehmen."
languages.original_text: "The Song of Trailing Blood tells of a path fraught with trials. By accepting it and setting out on that path, you passed the first one, the trial of resolve. For not everyone is prepared to shun their fear and doubt and embark on a search for the unknown. A search for death. The trial of compassion was the second one. You passed it when you put yourself, albeit briefly, in the service of another soul, a man suffering from burns. For the choice between life and death is to be made only by those willing to take responsibility for the pain of another."

Denn die Wahl zwischen Leben und Tod darf nur von jenen getroffen werden, die bereit sind, die Verantwortung für den Schmerz eines anderen zu übernehmen."

languages.text: «La canción del rastro de sangre habla de un camino lleno de pruebas. Al aceptarlo y empezar a recorrerlo, superó la primera, la prueba de la determinación, pues no todos están preparados para superar sus miedos y dudas y partir en busca de lo desconocido. En busca de la muerte. La prueba de la compasión era la segunda. La superó al ponerse, aun por poco tiempo, al servicio de otra alma, un hombre que sufría quemaduras, pues solo aquellos dispuestos a aceptar la responsabilidad por el dolor ajeno pueden tomar la elección entre la vida y la muerte».
languages.original_text: "The Song of Trailing Blood tells of a path fraught with trials. By accepting it and setting out on that path, you passed the first one, the trial of resolve. For not everyone is prepared to shun their fear and doubt and embark on a search for the unknown. A search for death. The trial of compassion was the second one. You passed it when you put yourself, albeit briefly, in the service of another soul, a man suffering from burns. For the choice between life and death is to be made only by those willing to take responsibility for the pain of another."

En busca de la muerte. La prueba de la compasión era la segunda. La superó al ponerse, aun por poco tiempo, al servicio de otra alma, un hombre que sufría quemaduras, pues solo aquellos dispuestos a aceptar la responsabilidad por el dolor ajeno pueden tomar la elección entre la vida y la muerte».

languages.text: 「血の跡を辿る歌は、試練に満ちた道についてを伝える。それを受け入れ、その道に足を踏み出すことで、あなたは最初の試練、覚悟の試練を乗り越えた。誰もが恐れや疑念を捨て、未知なるものの探求へと乗り出す準備ができているわけではないためだ。死の探求にも。2つ目は慈愛の試練だった。短い時間とはいえ、火傷で苦しんでいる男という他の存在のために自身の身を捧げたときに乗り越えた。生と死の選択は、他人の痛みに責任を負うことを厭わぬ者だけが下せるのだから」
languages.original_text: "The Song of Trailing Blood tells of a path fraught with trials. By accepting it and setting out on that path, you passed the first one, the trial of resolve. For not everyone is prepared to shun their fear and doubt and embark on a search for the unknown. A search for death. The trial of compassion was the second one. You passed it when you put yourself, albeit briefly, in the service of another soul, a man suffering from burns. For the choice between life and death is to be made only by those willing to take responsibility for the pain of another."

traits.locale_text: 「血の跡を辿る歌は、試練に満ちた道についてを伝える。それを受け入れ、その道に足を踏み出すことで、あなたは最初の試練、覚悟の試練を乗り越えた。誰もが恐れや疑念を捨て、未知なるものの探求へと乗り出す準備ができているわけではないためだ。死の探求にも。2つ目は慈愛の試練だった。短い時間とはいえ、火傷で苦しんでいる男という他の存在のために自身の身を捧げたときに乗り越えた。生と死の選択は、他人の痛みに責任を負うことを厭わぬ者だけが下せるのだから」

languages.text: “《血路之歌》讲述的是充满考验的道路。当您接受了试炼，踏上这条道路时，您便已经通过了最初的试炼，也就是决心的试炼。因为，并不是每个人都愿意克服心中的恐惧与疑惑，前往未知世界，踏上探索死亡的旅途。而第二项试炼，则是关于怜悯的试炼。当您将精力用来协助另一个灵魂，协助那个被烧伤的人时，您便通过了考验。尽管试炼本身很短暂，但只有那些愿意为他人的痛苦承担责任的人，才能做出生与死的抉择。”
languages.original_text: "The Song of Trailing Blood tells of a path fraught with trials. By accepting it and setting out on that path, you passed the first one, the trial of resolve. For not everyone is prepared to shun their fear and doubt and embark on a search for the unknown. A search for death. The trial of compassion was the second one. You passed it when you put yourself, albeit briefly, in the service of another soul, a man suffering from burns. For the choice between life and death is to be made only by those willing to take responsibility for the pain of another."

traits.locale_text: “《血路之歌》讲述的是充满考验的道路。当您接受了试炼，踏上这条道路时，您便已经通过了最初的试炼，也就是决心的试炼。因为，并不是每个人都愿意克服心中的恐惧与疑惑，前往未知世界，踏上探索死亡的旅途。而第二项试炼，则是关于怜悯的试炼。当您将精力用来协助另一个灵魂，协助那个被烧伤的人时，您便通过了考验。尽管试炼本身很短暂，但只有那些愿意为他人的痛苦承担责任的人，才能做出生与死的抉择。”

languages.text: « Le Chant de la piste de sang nous enseigne que le chemin à parcourir est semé d'embûches. En l'acceptant et en vous engageant sur cette voie, vous avez réussi la première épreuve, celle de la détermination. Car tous ne sont pas prêts à braver la peur et le doute pour se lancer dans la quête de l'inconnu. La quête de la mort. La deuxième épreuve est celle de la compassion. Vous l'avez passée lorsque vous vous êtes {mf|mis|mise} au service d'une autre âme, un pauvre homme grièvement brûlé, si bref votre élan de bonté fût-il. Car le choix entre la vie et la mort revient à ceux-là seuls qui sont disposés à endosser la responsabilité de la souffrance d'autrui. »
languages.original_text: "The Song of Trailing Blood tells of a path fraught with trials. By accepting it and setting out on that path, you passed the first one, the trial of resolve. For not everyone is prepared to shun their fear and doubt and embark on a search for the unknown. A search for death. The trial of compassion was the second one. You passed it when you put yourself, albeit briefly, in the service of another soul, a man suffering from burns. For the choice between life and death is to be made only by those willing to take responsibility for the pain of another."

languages.text: "Kan İzi Ezgisi, imtihanlarla bezenmiş bir yoldan bahseder. Bunu kabul edip yola adımınızı atarak ilk imtihan olan kararlılık imtihanını geçtiniz. Zira herkes; korkularını ve kuşkularını bastırarak bilinmeyene doğru, ölüme doğru bir arayışa geçmeye hazır değildir. İkinci imtihan, şefkat imtihanıydı. Bunu da kendinizi kısa bir süreliğine de olsa başka birinin, yanıklarının acısıyla cebelleşen bir adamın yerine koyarak geçtiniz. Çünkü ölüm ve yaşam arasındaki seçim, yalnızca başkasının çektiği acının sorumluluğunu yüklenmeye razı gelenler tarafından yapılabilir."
languages.original_text: "The Song of Trailing Blood tells of a path fraught with trials. By accepting it and setting out on that path, you passed the first one, the trial of resolve. For not everyone is prepared to shun their fear and doubt and embark on a search for the unknown. A search for death. The trial of compassion was the second one. You passed it when you put yourself, albeit briefly, in the service of another soul, a man suffering from burns. For the choice between life and death is to be made only by those willing to take responsibility for the pain of another."
